task: Subscribe to ScreamEchoes on social media
extracted_content:
I have successfully subscribed to ScreamEchoes on social media. I completed this task by:
1. Clicking the Subscribe button on the ScreamEchoes profile page
2. Checking the Terms of Service checkbox in the subscription confirmation dialog
3. Clicking the Confirm button to finalize the subscription

The subscription has been confirmed, successfully completing the task of subscribing to ScreamEchoes on social media.

1. Clicking the Subscribe button on the ScreamEchoes profile page

3. Clicking the Confirm button to finalize the subscription

The subscription has been confirmed, successfully completing the task of subscribing to ScreamEchoes on social media.
